mapper.select:
SELECT max(c.CHARGE_EXT) as mo, max(c.ME - c.nattrib1) as snNumber, count(distinct SERIAL_NUMBER) as passed FROM BDE.v_AUFT c LEFT JOIN IMS_VIEW.V_SNO_BOOKINGS b on c.CHARGE_EXT=b.WORKORDER_NUMBER WHERE 1=1
AND b.WORKORDER_NUMBER IN
#{mo}
AND b.STATION_NUMBER=#{stationNumber} AND CHARINDEX('_',b.SERIAL_NUMBER)=0

SELECT MAX(WORKORDER_NUMBER) as mo,MIN(DATE_CREATED) as firstBooking FROM IMS_VIEW.V_SNO_BOOKINGS WHERE 1=1
AND WORKORDER_NUMBER IN
#{mo}
AND STATION_NUMBER NOT LIKE '%ALP%' GROUP BY WORKORDER_NUMBER
